content.text:
# Florida Film Critics Circle Awards 2022

27th FFCC Awards
December 22, 2022
----
Best Picture:
Everything Everywhere All at Once
The 27th Florida Film Critics Circle Awards were held on December 22, 2022.
The nominations were announced on December 14, 2022, led by Everything Everywhere All at Once with eleven nominations.
Winners and nominees
, Best Director winner and Best Original Screenplay co-winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress co-winner]]
, Best Adapted Screenplay winner]]
Winners are listed at the top of each list in bold, while the runner-ups for each category are listed under them.
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-
! style="width=50%"| Best Picture
! style="width=50%"| Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
Everything Everywhere All at Once
* Runner-up: Decision to Leave
** Aftersun
** The Fabelmans
** Tár
| valign="top" |
'Park Chan-wook – Decision to Leave'
* Runner-up: Steven Spielberg – The Fabelmans
** Todd Field – Tár
** Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert – Everything Everywhere All at Once
** Charlotte Wells – Aftersun
|-
! style="width=50%"| Best Actor
! style="width=50%"| Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
'Colin Farrell – The Banshees of Inisherin as Pádraic Súilleabháin'
* Runner-up: Brendan Fraser – The Whale as Charlie
* Runner-up: Park Hae-il – Decision to Leave as Jang Hae-joon
** Austin Butler – Elvis as Elvis Presley
** Paul Mescal – Aftersun as Calum Paterson
| valign="top" |
'Cate Blanchett – Tár as Lydia Tár'
* Runner-up: Tang Wei – Decision to Leave as Song Seo-rae
** Danielle Deadwyler – Till as Mamie Till-Mobley
** Michelle Williams – The Fabelmans as Mitzi Schildkraut-Fabelman
** Michelle Yeoh – Everything Everywhere All at Once as Evelyn Quan Wang
|-
! style="width=50%"| Best Supporting Actor
! style="width=50%"| Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
'Ke Huy Quan – Everything Everywhere All at Once as Waymond Wang'
* Runner-up: Paul Dano – The Fabelmans as Burt Fabelman
** Brendan Gleeson – The Banshees of Inisherin as Colm Doherty
| valign="top" |
'Jessie Buckley – Women Talking as Mariche (TIE)
Nina Hoss – Tár as Sharon Goodnow (TIE)'
* Kerry Condon – The Banshees of Inisherin as Siobhán Súilleabháin
* Jamie Lee Curtis – Everything Everywhere All at Once as Deirdre Beaubeirdre
* Stephanie Hsu – Everything Everywhere All at Once as Joy Wang / Jobu Tupaki
|-
! style="width=50%"| Best Original Screenplay
! style="width=50%"| Best Adapted Screenplay
|-
| valign="top" |
'Park Chan-wook and Jeong Seo-Gyeong – Decision to Leave'
* Runner-up: Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert – Everything Everywhere All at Once
* Runner-up: Martin McDonagh – The Banshees of Inisherin
** Todd Field – Tár
** Steven Spielberg and Tony Kushner – The Fabelmans
| valign="top" |
'Sarah Polley – Women Talking'
* Runner-up: Rebecca Lenkiewicz – She Said
* Runner-up: George Miller and Augusta Gore – Three Thousand Years of Longing
** Guillermo del Toro, Matthew Robbins, Gris Grimly, and Patrick McHale – ''Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
** Rian Johnson – Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
|-

Turning Red
* Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio

All the Beauty and the Bloodshed

* Fire of Love
